SELECT
FROM V_WF_RU_TASK r INNER JOIN T_AP_BUSINESS t ON t.id = r.business_id INNER JOIN T_PT_USER u ON u.id = t.sender_id left join T_PT_DEPT dept on dept.id = u.dept_id WHERE ( r.ASSIGNEE = #{userId} OR ( r.ASSIGNEE IS NULL AND r.USER_ID = #{userId} ) ) ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATE DESC
